TITLE: Suggestions
UPVOTE_DESC: The emoji to use for upvoting suggestions
DOWNVOTE_DESC: The emoji to use for downvoting suggestions
DEFAULT_CH_DESC: The channel to send suggestions to
DEFAULT_EMBED_DESC: The default color for suggestion embeds
APPROVED_CH_DESC: The channel to send approved suggestions to
APPROVED_EMBED_DESC: The color for approved suggestion embeds
REJECTED_CH_DESC: The channel to send rejected suggestions to
REJECTED_EMBED_DESC: The color for rejected suggestion embeds
STAFF_DESC: The roles that can manage suggestions
